subject: Re: [junit] your opinion needed: package for unit testing codes
msgSnippet: On Thu, 29 Jan 2004 08:28:40 -0800 (PST), Mark Xu  ... Mark, This has been debated at length on this list.  You can search the archives for
messageBody:
On Thu, 29 Jan 2004 08:28:40 -0800 (PST), Mark Xu <xudianm@...>
wrote:

> should it be the same as the packge for the source
> codes been tested or not?
>
> my colleagues argued that it makes it easy to test
> the protected methods or packge scope methods if
> they live in the same package.

Mark,

This has been debated at length on this list. You can search the archives
for the different opinions. Google for "same package junit".

--
Jason Rogers

"So great is the ignorance, so very little the knowledge, of even the best
of men!" - John Wesley, "Christian Perfection"
